page.title: 08FARMING GROUPS IN N-E LEICS.
page.content: Farmers in the Marefield -Lowesby area may belong to one or more of several organisations which look after their interests. Most farmers belong to the{National {Union of Farmers}which will provide specialist services such as insurances tailored to their requirements. Farmers may also belong to{"producers {groups"}for certain crops which they grow.The cereals producers group, for instance are a group co-operating in the production of cereals,advising members on the most suitable seeds to sow,providing storage faciltiesfor the grain,and obtaining the best prices for its members.This is done in return for a small levy on the crop to provide its running expenses. { Young Farmers Groups}provide a social and educational organisation for the young people in an agricultural area.
